CN.content:

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
2. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))

4. PC 70 BM (Poly(4-vinylphenylene sulfone))
5. TiO2 (Titanium Dioxide)
6. Al (Aluminum)

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cell devices were fabricated according to the structure ITO / PEDOT : PSS / photoactive ( polymer : PC 70 BM ) / TiO 2 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In the paragraph you provided, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) - a type of transparent conductive oxide used as a substrate in the fabrication of solar cells.
2. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)) : PSS (Polystyrene Sulfonate) - a type of conducting polymer used to create a transparent electrode in solar cells.
3. photoactive (polymer : PC 70 BM) - a type of photoactive material that absorbs light and generates charge in solar cells.
4. TiO2 (Titanium Dioxide) - a white pigment used as a photocatalyst in solar cells.
5. Al (Aluminum) - a metal used as a contact material in solar cells.

These entities represent the different materials and components used in the fabrication of solar cells, and their properties play a crucial role in determining the efficiency and performance of the devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. PC 70 BM - a type of photoactive material that absorbs light and generates charge in solar cells, and its value is related to its ability to convert light into electrical charge.
2. TiO2 - a white pigment used as a photocatalyst in solar cells, and its value is related to its ability to absorb light and generate charge.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to the value of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PC 70 BM |
| TiO2 |

I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph.
